閩.definition: short name for Fujian province 福建[Fu2 jian4]; also pr. [Min2]

閩侯.definition: Minhou, a county in Fuzhou City 福州市[Fu2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian

閩侯縣.definition: Minhou, a county in Fuzhou City 福州市[Fu2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian

閩南話.definition: Southern Min, a family of Sinitic languages spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas; Hokkien, major variety of Southern Min

閩南語.definition: Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas; Hokkien, the most widely spoken variety of Southern Min

閩清.definition: Minqing, a county in Fuzhou City 福州市[Fu2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian

閩清縣.definition: Minqing, a county in Fuzhou City 福州市[Fu2zhou1 Shi4], Fujian

閩語.definition: Min dialects, spoken in Fujian Province, Taiwan etc
